message: are you a neural network? because you've got me all connected.
you must be a well-trained model, because you're absolutely perfect.
is your name gradient descent? because i'm falling for you step by step.
you're not overfitting - you're exactly what i'm looking for.
are you a transformer? because you've got my full attention.
my loss function is minimized when i'm with you.
you must be a gpu, because you make my heart run faster.
let's train together - i promise no overfitting.
you activate all my neurons in the best way.
are you batch normalization? because you make everything better.
